description:
Have you ever needed to send the same email or text message to different people? If you use your Palm phone to communicate to business partners, sales contacts, employees or customers QuickClip can help save you a lot of time and energy!

QuickClip allows you to edit and save commonly used phrases for responses you need to make via Email, SMS or any other application.  Customize a library of requently needed text responses. Then use QuickClips to instantly create an email or text message. QuickClip even allows you to copy the text directly to your phone's clipboard for instant pasting into any Palm application.

Stop wasting time re-typing the same responses over and over again. Get QuickClip, save your responses once and use them over and over again with one touch of your finger.
